# 1987 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation

The 1987 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation () was held in January 1988. It is part of the Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation series held in Hong Kong.
Top 10 song awards
